TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public Class HttpTransportBindingElement Inherits TransportBindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, IWsdlExportExtension
type HttpTransportBindingElement = class inherit TransportBindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension interface IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 表示用來指定傳輸訊息之 HTTP 傳輸的繫結項目。

span.span: Represents the binding element used to specify an HTTP transport for transmitting messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是一個起點，用來建立實作 HTTP 傳輸通訊協定的自訂繫結。The class is the starting point for creating a custom binding that implements the HTTP transport protocol. HTTP 是用於互通性目的的主要傳輸。HTTP is the primary transport used for interoperability purposes. 這個傳輸被支援的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 以確保與其他非 WCF Web 服務堆疊互通。This transport is supported by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to ensure interoperability with other non-WCF Web services stacks. WCF 服務模型會使用這個類別建立 factory 物件，可實作和介面。The WCF service model uses this class to create factory objects that implement the and interfaces. 然後，這些處理站物件會建立使用 HTTP 通訊協定傳輸 SOAP 訊息的通道和接聽程式。These factory objects, in turn, create the channels and listeners that transmit SOAP messages using the HTTP protocol. 您可以設定這個類別的屬性，以設定其所建立的處理站，例如：、 和 。You configure the factories that this class creates by setting its properties, such as , , and . 您也可以設定基底類別 的屬性，例如：、 和 。You can also set properties on the base class, , such as , , and . 如需完整的屬性清單，請參閱 。For a complete list of properties, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何強制使用 。The following code shows how to imperatively use the . [!code-csharp[S_Imperative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_imperative/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_Imperative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_imperative/vb/service.vb#1)] `HttpTransportBindingElement` 也可以在組態檔中使用，如下列組態所示。`HttpTransportBindingElement` can also be used in a configuration file as shown in the following configuration. ```xml ```

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示用戶端是否接受 Cookie 並在未來的要求傳播 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

value.span: 如果允許 Cookie，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if cookies are allowed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供這個屬性是為了方便與使用 Cookie 的 ASMX Web 服務互動，以確認從伺服器傳回的 Cookie 會自動複製到該服務未來所有的用戶端要求。This property is provided as a convenience for interacting with ASMX Web services that use cookies to make sure that the cookies returned from the server are automatically copied to all future client requests for that service. ## Examples 下列範例會設定此屬性，以表示從伺服器傳回的所有 Cookie 應該複製到未來的用戶端要求。The following example sets this property to indicate that all cookies from the server should be copied to future client requests. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBindingElement = new HttpBindingElement(); httpBindingElement.AllowCookies = true; ```

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否忽略本機位址的 Proxy。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether proxies are ignored for local addresses.

value.span: 如果忽略本機位址的 Proxy，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if proxies are ignored for local addresses; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本機位址是位於本機 LAN 或內部網路上的位址。A local address is one that is on the local LAN or intranet. WCF 一律忽略 proxy，若服務位址開頭`http://localhost`。WCF always ignores the proxy if the service address begins with `http://localhost`. 如果您希望用戶端在與相同電腦上的服務進行交談時通過 Proxy，應使用主機名稱 (而非 `localhost`)。You should use the host name (rather than `localhost`) if you want clients to go through a proxy when talking to services on the same machine. ## Examples 下列範例會將這個屬性設定為在對繫結執行要求時使用。The following example sets this property to use when performing requests on the binding. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBinding = new HttpTransportBindingElement(); httpBinding.BypassProxyOnLocal = true; ```

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要與服務端點建立持續連線。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to make a persistent connection to a service endpoint.

value.span: 如果對服務端點的要求應該包含具有值 的連線 HTTP 標頭，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the request to the service endpoint should contain a Connection HTTP header with the value ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性為 `true`，以傳送具有 `Keep-alive` 值的連線 HTTP 標頭。Set this property to `true` to send a Connection HTTP header with the value `Keep-alive`. 用戶端會使用這個屬性來表示持續連線的偏好設定。A client uses this property to indicate a preference for persistent connections. 當這個屬性為 `true` 時，如果服務端點支援用戶端對服務端點的連線，該連線就會持續。When this property is `true`, the connection that the client makes to a service endpoint is persistent if the service endpoint supports that. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[PoxSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/poxsample/cs/client/httpclient.cs#1)]

member this.LegacyExtendedProtectionPolicy : obj with get, set
public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxBufferSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用之緩衝區的大小上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.

summary.span: 對於經過緩衝處理的訊息，這個值與 相同。

span.span: For buffered messages this value is the same as .

summary.span: 對於已進行資料流處理的訊息，這個值為 SOAP 標頭的最大大小 (必須在緩衝模式中讀取)。

span.span: For streamed messages, this value is the maximum size of the SOAP headers, which must be read in buffered mode.

value.span: 緩衝區的大小上限，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於已進行資料流處理的訊息，如果訊息標頭大小超過這個屬性，則會擲回 。For streamed messages, if the size of the message headers is greater than this property, then a is thrown. 對於未進行資料流處理的訊息，如果訊息大小超過這個屬性，則會捨棄該訊息。For a non-streamed message, if the message size is greater than this property, then the message is dropped. 若未指定時，這個預設值為 65536。If not specified, this defaults to 65536. ## Examples 下列範例會將這個屬性設定為在對繫結執行要求時使用。The following example sets this property to use when performing requests on the binding. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBinding = new HttpTransportBindingElement(); httpBinding.MaxBufferSize = 16384; ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPendingAccepts { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPendingAccepts : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定服務能夠同時接受的最大連線數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections the service can accept simultaneously.

value.span: 服務能夠同時接受的最大連線數。

span.span: The maximum number of connections the service can accept simultaneously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 0，表示 WCF 會為您設定的值。The default value of is 0, which means WCF will configure the value for you. 您可以提高數目可以提供更好的延展性。You can increase the number for better scalability. 在自我裝載案例中，此屬性會控制同時 BeginGetContext 呼叫 WCF 將會叫用的最大數目。In the self-hosted case, this property controls the maximum number of simultaneous BeginGetContext calls WCF will invoke. 每次呼叫一些記憶體 BeginGetContext 就會釘選內緩衝處理的 managed 堆積。Each time BeginGetContext is called some memory is pinned within the managed heap for buffering. 如果太多緩衝區已釘選，可能會造成過多的堆積的分割。If too many buffers are pinned, excessive heap fragmentation may result. 在 web 裝載的情況下，會忽略這個屬性。This property is ignored in the web-hosted case.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證領域。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication realm.
The authentication realm.
The default value is "".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器會使用領域，分割保護的資源；每個分割可以有自己的驗證配置或授權資料庫。Servers use realms to partition protected resources; each partition can have its own authentication scheme or authorization database. 領域只限於基本和摘要式驗證使用。Realms are used only for basic and digest authentication. 當用戶端成功驗證之後，驗證對指定領域中的所有資源都有效。After a client successfully authenticates, the authentication is valid for all resources in a given realm. 如需領域的詳細說明，請參閱[RFC 2617](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=95943)。For a detailed description of realms, see [RFC 2617](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=95943).

Sub ExportPolicy (exporter As MetadataExporter, context As PolicyConversionContext) Implements IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy

span.span: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.

param.name: context
param.span: 您可以用於插入自訂原則判斷提示的 。

span.span: The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.

summary.span: 匯出關於繫結的自訂原則判斷提示。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會寫入 WSDL 資訊繫結相關的陳述式特定合約所公開，並由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用來傳達給用戶端的繫結堆疊中的這個自訂繫結項目存在。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 這個方法採用兩個參數： 和 物件。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 您可以使用 、 和 方法，取得已經在各種範圍匯出的原則判斷提示的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 接著使用這個方法將您自己的原則判斷提示新增至適當的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 屬性會公開正在匯出的端點的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 這可讓這個方法正確限定其匯出原則判斷提示的範圍。This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，程式碼中的安全性屬性可能會將行為加入至 ，指出應在何處加入安全性原則判斷提示。For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 在自訂原則判斷提示附加至 WSDL 資訊之後，用戶端就可以實作 介面來偵測及匯入自訂繫結判斷提示。Once custom policy assertions have been attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::TransferMode TransferMode { System::ServiceModel::TransferMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::TransferMode value); };
member this.TransferMode : System.ServiceModel.TransferMode with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定傳輸模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the transfer mode.

value.span: 下列 的其中一個成員值：

span.span: One of the following member values of :
- Buffered
- Streamed
- StreamedRequest
- StreamedResponse

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定 = Streamed 表示 `StreamedRequest` 及 `StreamedResponse` 兩者。Specifying = Streamed implies both `StreamedRequest` and `StreamedResponse`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器上是否啟用不安全的連線共用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Unsafe Connection Sharing is enabled on the server.

summary.span: 如果已啟用，NTLM 驗證會在各 TCP 連線上執行一次。

span.span: If enabled, NTLM authentication is performed once on each TCP connection.

value.span: 如果已啟用不安全的連線共用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if Unsafe Connection Sharing is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設為 `true`，且使用 NTLM 驗證特定連線上的第一個要求時，在相同連線上的後續要求都會使用初始要求 中的驗證資訊進行處理。When this property is set to `true` and the first request over a particular connection is authenticated using NTLM, subsequent requests over the same connection are processed using the authentication information in of the initial request. 當 NTLM 不是驗證通訊協定時，這個屬性不會有任何作用。This property has no effect when NTLM is not the authentication protocol. > [!NOTE] > 雖然將這個屬性設為 `true` 可以提高效能，因為不會傳送其他 NTLM 驗證挑戰，但是不要求所有要求提供驗證資訊會有安全性風險。While setting this property to `true` increases performance because additional NTLM authentication challenges are not sent, there is a security risk in not requiring all requests to provide authentication information. 您必須決定是否值得冒這個風險以提升效能。You must determine whether the increase in performance is worth this risk. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例會設定此屬性，以啟用不安全的連線共用。The following example sets the property to enable Unsafe Connection Sharing. ```csharp HttpTransportBindingElement httpBinding = new HttpTransportBindingElement(); httpBinding.AuthenticationScheme = AuthenticationSchemes.Ntlm; httpBinding.UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication = true; ```
